articles.description: Hidden under the trees is a Ukrainian drone team, spying on Russian positions. Drones are used to mark the target for artillery strikes, but they are not immune to Russian signal jamming. CNN's Nic Robertson takes a look at some of the high-tech combat tools …

articles.title: Six takeaways from Kansas, Michigan, Missouri, Arizona and Washington primaries
articles.description: Kansas voters handed abortion-rights advocates a massive victory Tuesday, surging to the polls to defeat a measure that would have allowed the GOP-led legislature to impose new restrictions.
